org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer

Class CriteriaItemHelper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vaadin.addons.beantuplecontainer.BeanTupleItemHelper
      • org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer.CriteriaItemHelper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of entity underneath the items.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.Query

    public final class CriteriaItemHelper<T>
extends BeanTupleItemHelper
    Entity query implementation which dynamically injects missing query definition properties to CompositeItems.

      • saveItems

        public void saveItems(List<com.vaadin.data.Item> addedItems,
             List<com.vaadin.data.Item> modifiedItems,
             List<com.vaadin.data.Item> removedItems)
        Saves the modifications done by container to the query result. Query will be discarded after changes have been saved and new query loaded so that changed items are sorted appropriately.
        Specified by:
        saveItems in interface org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.Query
        Overrides:
        saveItems in class BeanTupleItemHelper
        Parameters:
        addedItems - Items to be inserted.
        modifiedItems - Items to be updated.
        removedItems - Items to be deleted.
